EngineRule.ruleSpecification: <AttributeValues objType="ext.lps.power.POWERDefinitionDocument"> <!-- set the folder --> <AttrValue id="folder.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.folder.server.impl.FolderPathAttributeAlgorithm"> <Arg>/Default/Documents</Arg> </AttrValue> <!-- set the lifecycle --> <AttrValue id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.lifecycle.server.impl.LifeCycleTemplateAttributeAlgorithm"> <Arg>POWER Design Part LifeCycle</Arg> </AttrValue> <!-- set the number to a generated number --> <AttrValue id="number" algorithm="com.ptc.windchill.enterprise.revisionControlled.server.impl.NumberGenerator"> <Arg>DOC</Arg> <Arg>{GEN:wt.enterprise.SequenceGenerator:POWERDefinitionDocument_seq:9:0}</Arg> </AttrValue> <!-- set the version schema to the NumericStateBased one --> <AttrValue id="MBA|versionInfo" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.vc.server.impl.VersionInfoGenerator"> <Arg>wt.series.HarvardSeries.NumericStateBased</Arg> </AttrValue> <!-- set default security label value --> <AttrValue id="POWERJURISDICTIONCLASSIFICATION" algorithm="ext.lps.power.access.rule.algorithm.POWERJurisdictionClassificationAlgorithm"/> <!-- specify AttrConstraint tag --> <AttrConstraint id="folder.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerPreGeneratedValue"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> <AttrConstraint id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerAssignedConstraint"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> <AttrConstraint id="lifeCycle" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerAssignedConstraint"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> <AttrConstraint id="number" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerAssignedConstraint"/> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetImmutableConstraint"/> </AttrConstraint> <AttrConstraint id="POWERJURISDICTIONCLASSIFICATION" algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GatherAttributeConstraints"> <Value algorithm="com.ptc.core.rule.server.impl.GetServerPreGeneratedValue"/> </AttrConstraint> </AttributeValues>
